name: ミンク
message: "You what?"
He tears my pants off. My boxers go with them.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't want to use this power... But..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I want to know... what I am."

name: ミンク
message: "Then first, abandon everything. Everything that keeps you safe."

name: ミンク
message: "Otherwise, you'll never get what you really want."
His cold voice echoes in my ears like an incantation.
He spreads my ass open with his hands and presses his erection against my tender entrance.
And then, with no preparation at all... he forces his way in.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aaah... Eek... Aghh...!"
My body starts to feel strange, kind of like when I was high on photonarcotics.
Only this time... my mind is clear.
The sensation of having my dry insides pried open is agony to my lucid mind―like a knife slicing into a fresh wound.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh... Aah, gah... Ngh..."
I scratch at the hard wall, desperate for salvation as stilted groans work their way from my throat.
I sink my teeth into the back of my hand in a pathetic attempt to distract myself with another kind of pain.
I can feel Mink growing inside me.
Pain. Unimaginable... pain!

name: ミンク
message: "Face me."
My ears are ringing. His husky voice burns itself into my dimming thoughts.

name: ミンク
message: "I'm the one making you suffer. You can't hide. Let it all out."
Mink pounds into me repeatedly, as if to punctuate his words.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aaah, ahh... Ngh, ugh, uuh... Aaaah!"

name: ミンク
message: "Let the pain fill you. Let me fill you. Let it draw out what's sleeping inside."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guh, ngh, ugh... Hngh, aah, eek... Ngh, aaaaah...!"
He pulls on my hair and I cry out in agony. My body is a tempest of pain.
The pain of being violated so thoroughly by another man.
But in the back of my mind, while I listen to Mink's words... is the feeling that this act has some other, hidden meaning.
But why I feel that way, I can't say...

name: ミンク
message: "Carve the memory of me into every inch of your body. Know me so deeply that every time you see my face, you will remember this feeling."
The words repeat in my ear, over and over, amid the torment of his thrusts.
Mink's voice is clawing its way into my brain.

name: 蒼葉
message: "O-Oow, aaah... Guh, ugh... Ngh!"
Just as the pain begins to overwhelm my thoughts, Mink thrusts inside as deep as he can go.
His body goes rigid, and I can hear him softly panting...
I'm on the verge of passing out. Everything after that is a blur.
I feel him slide out of me and the weight vanish from my back.
Just as I'm about to collapse to the floor, something holds my body up.
I feel like I'm floating. The world is moving around me...
...like I'm being carried somewhere...
Then, something soft envelops my body... and I sink into darkness.
